title: Play button grayed out
body: Play button has been grayed out for a while now in my beta launcher on my laptop.  both launchers work on my home PC, and the old launcher also works on the laptop. I've tried a full repair, didn't fix it.  Suggestions?  Preferably other than uninstall?

replies.body: This is probably a security setting problem that's failing to launch the client.  I suggest using the [permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide to restore access and get passed the patcher.  I hope that helps!
I realized that Windows firewall turned itself back on. Thanks Porocles, problem solved
